Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'You have been successfully modified, Miss Tifa.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "How does it feel? Still a much more humane process than turning a human into a Construct, don't you agree? The pain... that will pass soon.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'I did not grow stronger... and now you turned me into this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Indeed, you're still very weak, but... the Punishing Virus is strong.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You need only familiarize yourself with the power of the virus. Trust me, you will very quickly grow to like your new body...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But I have to tell you, in this place... you are not the only special one...', 4: '2'}
